title: askmen font sans serif
content:
Hi all

Does anyone know the font that is used throughout the askmen.com website? (Not in the logo)

Image here:

[http://wtf2.myfonts.com/uploads/images/7a/7a5449fdd12c23eaba76d7eb7471b8...](http://web.archive.org/web/20130401090855/http:/wtf2.myfonts.com/uploads/images/7a/7a5449fdd12c23eaba76d7eb7471b8c1.10099.jpeg "http://wtf2.myfonts.com/uploads/images/7a/7a5449fdd12c23eaba76d7eb7471b8c1.10099.jpeg")

Any help would be cool
author: TF22Raptor
